## GLOBAL CLASS TRANSLATIONS
##I am pulling out many of the keys that are class based from individual translation files, such as Groups and Forms, and pulling them into this translation file. This is being done to avoid duplicate lookup strings across translation files.
## To view the different classes, go here. http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/CurrikiSpaceClass?editor=class
## I am also adding to this trans file elements that are used globally but not in class. Media Type roll over text for example.
##FROM GWT or XWIKI CORE loading.loading_msg=Sedang memuat, silakan tunggu... problemoccured=Sebuah error terjadi saat memroses permintaan Anda. Silakan mengirim email ke webmaster@curriki.org jika error ini terjadi kembail.
## ##ASSET CLASS USED IN RESOURCES

##CATEGORY AND / OR FILE TYPE ##Although the below are not taken from the Assets, that is, these most of these values are NOT stored in the classes, I am adding them to this file because they are global. Todd December 31, 2008.
archive.sco=Arsip: sco archive.zip=Arsip: zip archive.gz=Arsip: gz archive.xo=Arsip: xo archive.sit=Arsip: sit archive.gtar=Arsip: gtar archive.tar=Arsip: tar audio.wav=Audio: wav audio.mp3=Audio: mp3 ##The next two are duplicates from above. Should be able to remove these once the above are approved. If the above changes, then these will need stay. collection.collection=Koleksi collection.folder=Folder document.notebook=Attached File: notebook document.odt=Berkas Lampiran: odt document.odg=Berkas Lampiran: odg document.odp=Berkas Lampiran: odp document.ods=Berkas Lampiran: ods document.odc=Berkas Lampiran: odc document.odf=Berkas Lampiran: odf document.odb=Berkas Lampiran: odb document.odi=Berkas Lampiran: odi document.ppt=Berkas Lampiran: ppt document.pptx=Berkas Lampiran: pptx document.doc=Berkas Lampiran: doc document.docx=Berkas Lampiran: docx document.pdf=Berkas Lampiran: pdf document.xls=Berkas Lampiran: xls document.xlsx=Berkas Lampiran: xlsx document.txt=Berkas Lampiran: txt document.xml=Berkas Lampiran: xml document.css=Berkas Lampiran: css document.rtf =Berkas Lampiran: rtf document.dcr=Berkas Lampiran: cdcr document.dir=Berkas Lampiran: dir document.exe=Berkas Lampiran: exe document.bin=Berkas Lampiran: bin document.iha=Berkas Lampiran: iha document.izh=Berkas Lampiran: izh document.class=Berkas Lampiran: class document.php=Berkas Lampiran: php document.jar=Berkas Lampiran: jar document.ps=Berkas Lampiran: ps unknown.unknown=Tidak dikenal ##I added the below string as the one above is not working.
